channel.description: Recent content in HLSL on Cyanilux

item.title: Local UVs for Sprites in Sprite Sheet/Atlas
item.description: A small post explaining how to convert the UVs of a sprite sheet (or sprites packed in an atlas) into local 0-1 coordinates across each sprite in the shader

item.title: Writing Shader Code in Universal RP (v2)
item.description: Explains how shader code (ShaderLab & HLSL) is written to support the Universal RP

item.title: Intro to the Shader Pipeline
item.description: An introduction to what a Mesh, Shader and Material is in Unity, how to set Shader Properties from C#, various types of Batching, and a brief look at Forward, Forward+ and Deferred rendering paths

item.title: Depth
item.description: A big post explaining everything about Depth : Depth Buffer, Depth Texture / Scene Depth node, SV_Depth, Reconstructing World Position from Depth, etc.
